mapper.select: select count(*) from memberlist where m_id=#{sessionid} and m_societyname=#{societyname}
mapper.insert: insert into memberlist(m_id,m_name,m_level,m_joindate,m_societyname) values(#{sessionid},(select m_name from member where m_id=#{sessionid}),1,sysdate,#{societyname})
mapper.update: update society set s_joinpeople = s_joinpeople+1 where s_name=#{societyname}
